param.name: description
param.value: Map length and quality-filtered reads against a reference sequence; identify consensus and variant sequences using Quiver algorithm.

module.label: SFilter v1
module.description: This module filters reads based on a minimum subread length, polymerase read quality and polymerase read length.

module.label: BLASR v1
module.description: BLASR maps reads to genomes by finding the highest scoring local alignment or set of local alignments between the read and the genome. The first set of alignments is found by querying an index of the reference genome, and then refining until only high scoring alignments are retained. Additional pulse metrics are loaded into the resulting cmp.h5 file to enable downstream use of the Quiver algorithm.

param.name: maxHits
param.label: Maximum number of hits per read
param.title: The maximum number of matches of each read to the reference sequence that will be evaluated. maxHits should be greater than the expected number of repeats if you want to spread hits out on the genome.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 0 and 1000

param.name: maxDivergence
param.label: Maximum divergence (%)
param.title: The maximum allowed divergence (in %) of a read from the reference sequence.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 0 and 100

param.name: minAnchorSize
param.label: Minimum anchor size
param.title: The minimum size of the read (in base pairs) that must match against the reference.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 8 and 30

param.name: samBam
param.label: Write output as a BAM file
param.title: Specify whether or not to output a BAM representation of the cmp.h5 file.

param.name: gff2Bed
param.label: Write BED coverage file
param.title: Specify whether or not to output a BED representation of the depth of coverage summary.

param.name: placeRepeatsRandomly
param.label: Place repeats randomly
param.title: Specify that if BLASR maps a read to more than one location with equal probability, then it randomly selects which location it chooses as the best location. If not set, defaults to the first on the list of matches.

param.name: loadPulsesOpts
param.title: The default option of loadPulses is 'byread'. Option 'bymetric' is desined to sacrifice memory for increased speed, especially for jobs of which the number of reference contigs is large.

module.label: Quiver v1
module.description: Quiver identifies haploid SNPs and indels by performing a local realignment of reads using the full range of sequence quality metrics.

param.name: algorithm
param.label: Consensus algorithm
param.title: Specify the consensus/variant algorithm to use in the analysis.

param.name: outputConsensus
param.label: Output consensus FASTA and FASTQ files
param.title: Specify whether or not to output FASTA and FASTQ representations of the consensus sequence.

param.name: makeVcf
param.label: Write SNPs/Variants as VCF file
param.title: Specify whether or not to output a VCF representation of the variants.

param.name: makeBed
param.label: Write SNPs/Variants as BED file
param.title: Specify whether or not to output a BED representation of the variants.

param.name: enableMapQVFilter
param.label: Use only unambiguously mapped reads
param.title: Specify whether or not to filter out reads where Map QV is less than 10. Reduces coverage in repeat regions that are shorter than the read length.

param.name: diploidMode
param.label: Diploid analysis
param.title: Specify whether or not Quiver operates in diploid mode and calls variants with the assumption that there are two copies of the genome in the sample; the mapping specificity should be higher.
